name: Badger Break-In: LD 48
description: Two companions; Benjamin the Badger and GoldenEye the Chamele-gun join each other to embark on an adventure. Together they will traverse the depths of the Slice Beetle Queen's lair, to steal her sweet Royal Honey. Use Z to Jump around, and use X to command GoldenEye to strike her tongue in front of her. Up and Down are used on climbing, and Left and Right arrow keys will move the character Left and Right.
